thread.title: Sunday Sound Off: Biggest concern for the Royals
thread.title_full: Sunday Sound Off: Biggest concern for the Royals

author: 41 Action News Staff
title: Sunday Sound Off: Biggest concern for the Royals
text:
Next 
KANSAS CITY, Mo. - Frank Boal discussed sports with experts on Sunday night. 
Soren Petro with 810 Sports, former Royals outfielder Les Norman and former Chiefs center Tim Grundhard talked about all the hot topics involving the Royals, the Chiefs and college football. 
This week's hot topics: What is the biggest concern for the Royals? Which Wild Card team is a better match-up for the Royals: New York Yankees or Houston Astros? Will we see "Lock-tober" at Mizzou? 
WATCH the videos to hear their discussion. Copyright 2015 Scripps Media, Inc. All rights reserved. This material may not be published, broadcast, rewritten, or redistributed.
